trans-unit.source: An implementation of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider"></xref> that acts as a container of types within the indicated assemblies and code compile units.

This <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider> implementation, in addition to handling compiled assemblies (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.AddAssembly%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.AddAssemblyReference%2A> methods), can handle types that have not been compiled yet (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.AddCodeCompileUnit%2A>).
The limited implementation of <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> is returned for types referenced using <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit>.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider> only returns public types from referenced assemblies, and both public and non-public types from local assemblies.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider"></xref> class.
The encapsulated <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref> for this instance.
Adds an already-loaded assembly.

It is the caller's responsibility to load the assembly, and <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider"></xref> includes the types from this assembly for dispensing when <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.GetType"></xref> is called.
The <xref href="System.Type.Assembly"></xref> to add a reference for.
assembly is a null reference (Visual Basic `Nothing`).
Adds a reference to the <xref href="System.Type.Assembly"></xref> to the internal list.
This assembly is used for the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> lookup in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.GetType(System.String)"></xref> method.
The path of the <xref href="System.Type.Assembly"></xref> to add.
path is a null reference (Visual Basic `Nothing`).
Adds a reference to the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> to the internal list.

This <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> is used for the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> lookup in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.GetType(System.String)"></xref> method.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> to add.
codeCompileUnit is a null reference (Visual Basic `Nothing`).
codeCompileUnit is already referenced in this instance.
Gets or sets the delegate that references a method with one parameter and one return value that returns the assembly display name in which a specified type belongs to.
The delegate that references a method with one parameter and one return value that returns the assembly display name that a specified type belongs to.
Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider"></xref>.
Returns the assembly display name of the assembly in which the specified type is declared.
The type whose assembly name to get.
The assembly display name of the assembly in which the specified type is declared.
Provides a string array that contains the names for the specified <xref href="System.Enum"></xref> in indexed order.
The type to obtain the names from.
The names for the specified <xref href="System.Enum"></xref> in indexed order.
enumType is a null reference (Visual Basic `Nothing`).
enumType Is not an .
Gets the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of an <xref href="System.EventHandler"></xref>, given a reference to an <xref href="System.Reflection.EventInfo"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Reflection.EventInfo"></xref> to obtain the <xref href="System.EventHandler"></xref> type of.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of an <xref href="System.EventHandler"></xref>, given a reference to an <xref href="System.Reflection.EventInfo"></xref>.
eventInfo is a null reference (Visual Basic `Nothing`).
Gets the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that provides the designated service <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
If the encapsulated <xref:System.IServiceProvider> associated with this instance is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) then a null reference (`Nothing`) is returned.
The service <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is to provide.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that provides the designated service <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.

Gets the type from the set of assemblies added to the `TypeProvider` using <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.AddAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)"></xref>, <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.AddAssemblyReference(System.String)"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.AddCodeCompileUnit(System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit)"></xref>.
If the name is not resolvable within the cache of assemblies and compiled units of this instance, a null reference (Visual Basic `Nothing`) is returned.
Invoking this overload is the same as invoking the two parameter overloads with the value of the parameter `throwOnError` set to `true`.
The type name.
The requested <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
name is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)

Gets the type from the set of assemblies added to the `TypeProvider` using <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.AddAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)"></xref>, <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.AddAssemblyReference(System.String)"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.AddCodeCompileUnit(System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit)"></xref>.
If the name is not resolvable within the cache of assemblies and compiled units of this instance, a null reference (`Nothing`) is returned; in the case that `throwOnError` is `false`.
The type name.
A value that indicates whether to throw an exception if name is not resolvable.
The requested <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
name is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)
name is not resolvable and throwOnError is `true`.
Creates an array that contains each <xref href="System.Type"></xref> known to this instance.
An array that contains each <xref href="System.Type"></xref> known to this instance.
Any <xref href="System.Type"></xref> fails to load.
Indicates whether one type can be safely assigned to another type.
The target <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the assignment.
The source <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the assignment.
`true` if the assignment can be safely made; otherwise `false`.
Indicates whether a <xref href="System.Type"></xref> is of type <xref href="System.Enum"></xref> .
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> to be tested.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> is an <xref href="System.Enum"></xref> ; otherwise `false`.
type is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Indicates whether a <xref href="System.Type"></xref> is a derived class of another <xref href="System.Type"></xref> .
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> being tested as a derived class.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> being tested as the class.
`true` if the tested relationship is true; otherwise `false`.
Returns a value that determines whether the specified property is supported in the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
The property to resolve.
The instance in which the specified property is declared.
`true` if the specified property is supported in the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]; otherwise, `false`.

Gets or sets the delegate that references a method with two parameters and one return value that determines whether a specified property is supported in the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

The delegate that references a method with two parameters and one return value that determines whether a specified property is supported in the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
Gets a value that represents the locally defined <xref href="System.Reflection.Assembly"></xref> for this instance.
The locally defined <xref href="System.Reflection.Assembly"></xref> for this instance.
Gets a collection of all assemblies referenced by the <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
A collection of all assemblies referenced by the <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
Updates the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> reference associated with this instance.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.TypesChanged> is raised when this method is invoked.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> to refresh with.
The <xref href="System.EventHandler"></xref> to delegate this event to.
codeCompileUnit is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
This instance already references the subject <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref>.
Removes all references to the subject <xref href="System.Reflection.Assembly"></xref> from this instance.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.TypesChanged> is raised when this method is invoked.
The <xref href="System.Reflection.Assembly"></xref> to remove from this instance.
assembly is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)
Removes a path-based <xref href="System.Reflection.Assembly"></xref> reference from this instance.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.TypesChanged> is raised when this method is invoked.
The path of the <xref href="System.Reflection.Assembly"></xref> to be removed.
path is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)
Removes all references to the subject <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> from this instance.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.TypesChanged> is raised when this method is invoked.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> to be removed.
codeCompileUnit is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)
Sets the value of the local <xref href="System.Reflection.Assembly"></xref> to the referenced <xref href="System.Reflection.Assembly"></xref> .
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.TypesChanged> is raised when this method is invoked.

Call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.SetLocalAssembly%28System.Reflection.Assembly%29> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.AddAssembly%28System.Reflection.Assembly%29> otherwise it has no affect on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider>.
The <xref href="System.Reflection.Assembly"></xref> used to set this value
Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> of load error exceptions keyed by the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that causes the <xref href="System.Exception"></xref>.
An updated, detached <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> is created at each reference to this property.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> of load error exceptions keyed by the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that causes the <xref href="System.Exception"></xref>.
Occurs when the collection <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.TypeLoadErrors"></xref> is modified.
Occurs when the collection of defined types is modified.
